content: What the writer of this article fails to understand, or at least fails to tell the reader, is that this country isn’t a Democracy. We are a Republic. The popular vote has only a limited correlation to who wins. The only vote total that matters is the Electoral College results. This was intended by the Founding Fathers so that one or two population centers wouldn’t control national elections. It’s worked well for over 200 years. It doesn’t need to be changed.
